data.title: Nyai Walidah Story
data.meta_description: nyai walidah story - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Nyai Walidah, later known as Nyai Ahmad Dahlan, was born in the village of Pesantren Kauman in Yogyakarta to a prominent Islamic scholar. She did not attend formal school as a child due to societal norms, but studied religion. After marrying Ahmad Dahlan, she helped promote gender equality in education. She founded Sopo Tresno, later renamed Aisyiyah, to educate mothers. Aisyiyah grew in membership and became affiliated with Muhammadiyah. Nyai Ahmad Dahlan continued advocating for women's education and took leadership roles after her husband's death. She advised national leaders and supported fighters for Indonesian independence
